textboxes.description: You’ve heard whispers about the Petroshintoist extremists, a radical faction that blends ancient shintoist rituals with modern petrochemical powers. But nothing could prepare you for what you’re seeing now. The streets of New York are eerily calm, as if the city itself is holding its breath. Suddenly, a series of magical explosions shatter the silence, sending magical energy and fire coursing through the city.

choices.text: Run toward the source of the explosion to help the injured
Stay hidden and gather information about the attack
Call for emergency services and stay out of the conflict

textboxes.description: You rush toward the explosion site, helping those who are injured and trapped in the wreckage. The magical energy lingers in the air, sizzling with dangerous potency. You realize that this isn't just a bombing; it’s an attack designed to destroy both physically and magically. You try to help as many people as possible but need to act fast before more strikes come.

choices.text: Use your knowledge of magical barriers to shield the survivors
Warn everyone to flee and save yourself

textboxes.description: You stay back, trying to remain unnoticed as you observe the chaos. From a distance, you spot several individuals dressed in robes, chanting under their breath while manipulating the petrochemical magic in the air. They are the Petroshintoists, and their goal is clear: chaos and destruction, justified by their twisted spiritual beliefs.

choices.text: Approach the extremists to try and reason with them
Take photos and gather evidence to expose them later
Call the authorities and report the extremists

textboxes.description: You quickly call emergency services and alert them to the bombing. While waiting for help to arrive, you hear another explosion in the distance. Panic starts to spread as you realize the full scale of the attack. Time is of the essence.

choices.text: Help the injured while waiting for responders
Try to find shelter and avoid the chaos

textboxes.description: You cast a magical barrier, protecting the survivors from more falling debris. The magical energy radiates around you, but the pressure of maintaining the barrier is intense. You can hear the chants of the Petroshintoists getting louder, signaling the next wave of destruction.

choices.text: Keep the barrier up but attempt to negotiate with the extremists
Break the barrier and flee to find safety

textboxes.description: You abandon the survivors in an attempt to escape the area. The magical explosions continue to rock the city. You find shelter in a nearby building but can still hear the echoes of destruction in the distance.

choices.text: Check the news for more information about the attack
Regret your decision to leave and return to help

textboxes.description: You approach the extremists, hoping to reason with them. The leader, a fierce-looking figure in black robes, notices you and stops chanting. They ask, 'What is it that you want, outsider? Do you not see the truth of our actions?' The atmosphere is tense, and you feel a pressure in the air.

choices.text: Tell them that their actions are unjust and need to stop
Attempt to distract them while trying to disable the magical source

textboxes.description: You snap several photos, documenting the magical destruction caused by the Petroshintoists. The images might be useful later, but for now, you have to decide what to do with this evidence.

choices.text: Submit the photos to the authorities
Post the photos online to expose them

textboxes.description: You find a secure building, locking the door behind you. You’re safe for now, but the city is in chaos, and you don’t know how bad the attack will get. The sound of distant explosions continues.

choices.text: Stay in hiding and wait for the responders
Try to escape the city entirely

textboxes.description: You check the news, where it’s reported that the Petroshintoist extremists have launched a series of magical attacks across New York. There’s no clear motive, but the authorities are scrambling to respond. You realize that your decision might have influenced the outcome of the day.

choices.text: Continue watching the news for updates
Decide to act further and stop the extremists at all costs

textboxes.description: The extremist leader glares at you. 'You are weak,' they say. 'The world is in ruin, and you stand in the way of our divine work.' A magical force builds up around them, and you realize that negotiation is no longer an option.

choices.text: Prepare to defend yourself and fight back
Flee and warn others

textboxes.description: You manage to disable the magical device temporarily, but not without a struggle. The extremists notice and start chanting frantically, preparing for their next attack.

choices.text: Try to fight them off and stop the magic once and for all
Escape the scene while you can

textboxes.description: You attempt to leave the city entirely, but the roads are blocked by responders and other evacuees. It’s clear that New York will be affected by this attack for some time.

choices.text: Look for an alternative route out of the city
Return to the city center and try to help survivors

textboxes.description: You engage in a fierce struggle with the extremists. The air is thick with magical energy, and every move feels like a life-or-death decision. You manage to overpower a few, but the leaders remain focused, fueling their ritual. The outcome rests on your next action.

choices.text: Attempt one final strike to stop the ritual
Retreat to preserve your strength

textboxes.description: After navigating through side streets and hidden pathways, you finally reach the city’s outskirts. From a distance, you witness the ongoing battle for New York. The Petroshintoist attack is relentless, but you’ve managed to escape the immediate danger.

choices.text: Reflect on the events and what they mean for the future
Consider returning to help others

textboxes.description: As the news continues to report on the Petroshintoist attacks, you find a moment to process everything. The city may recover, but the scars left by this day will linger. Whatever decisions you made, you know they played a part in shaping the outcome.
